## Features of FX Science Tools 20.02.10 with Crack
 
FX Science Tools 20.02.10 with Crack consists of three separate sections for typing different types of formulas:
 
- **Type Chemistry - FX Chem:** This section makes writing chemical equations dead simple. You just type and FX Chem knows enough about chemistry to put all of the components of the equation into the right spots. FX Chem can even produce nuclear chemistry equations - something that is very difficult in Word[^1^].
- **Type Chemical Structures - FX ChemStruct:** This section does to organic structures what FX Chem does for chemical equations. Just type the structural formula of a compound and FX ChemStruct will draw a structural diagram. No "drawing" required[^1^].
- **Type Physics - FX Equation:** This section is a totally different way of entering equations. No other program can rival FX Equation's easy, high speed creation of secondary science equations. FX Equation is for anyone who gets frustrated with their current equation editor[^2^].

## How to Use FX Science Tools 20.02.10 with Crack
 
To use FX Science Tools 20.02.10 with Crack, you need to open Word and select the section you want to use from the FX Science Tools tab on the ribbon. Then, you can type your formulas using the keyboard or the toolbar buttons. You can also insert symbols, subscripts, superscripts, brackets, arrows, etc., using the toolbar or keyboard shortcuts.
 
For example, if you want to type a chemical equation using FX Chem, you can type something like this:
 
C6H12O6 + O2 -> CO2 + H2O
